title: Bloomberg Markets: Boudway on `The Silicon Valley Warriors'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Boudway on `The Silicon Valley Warriors'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ira Boudway Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing his Bloomberg Businessweek story "The Silicon Valley Warriors" and meeting investor Rudy Cline-Thomas, the man coaching NBA stars like Golden State Warriors' Andre Iguodala and Stephen Curry to become Silicon Valley Warriors, and building a pipeline between Silicon Valley and professional athletes.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
